p: HBV-reporter cells, HepG2.2.15 (human hepatoblastoma line, HepG2-derived) were kindly obtained from Dr. S. Jameel (International Center for Genetic Engineering & Biotechnology, New Delhi, India). HepG2.2.15 cell were maintained in RPMI-1640 medium (Invitrogen, USA), supplemented with 10% heat-inactivated bovine calf serum (Gibco, USA), 1x penicillin-streptomycin (Invitrogen, USA), and 1x sodium pyruvate (HyClone Laboratories, USA) at 37 0C in a humidified chamber with 5% CO 2 supply.
